General.Name: DGB Asia Bhd
General.Description: DGB Asia Berhad, an investment holding company, engages in the development and provision of software and engineering consultancy for automated identification and data collection (AIDC) in Malaysia, Taiwan, and internationally. It operates through Proprietary Software, AIDC Hardware/Equipment, Leisure and Hospitality, Value Added Products and Services, and Logistics Services segments. The Proprietary Software segment licenses customized in-house software, as well as offers maintenance and technical support, and software customization and development services. The AIDC Hardware/Equipment segment sells bar code and radio frequency identification reading equipment, hand-held computers, and radio frequency data communication systems. The Leisure and Hospitality segment operates a hotel. The Value Added Products and Machines segment engages in retailing of consumables, vending machines, and other prodycts; digital advertising; and other related activities. The Logistics Services segment provides courier, fulfilment, warehouse, and other services. The company was formerly known as DSC Solutions Berhad and changed its name to DGB Asia Berhad in April 2014. DGB Asia Berhad was founded in 1993 and is headquartered in Petaling Jaya, Malaysia.
